subject: log4j problem while unit testing servlet
msgSnippet: Hi Friends, I am unit testing a servlet using cactus. Everything is set( all required files), but tomcat gives me a warning, as follows. log4j:WARN No
messageBody:
Hi Friends,

I am unit testing a servlet using cactus.
Everything is set( all required files), but tomcat gives me a warning, as
follows.

log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger
(org.apache.catalina.startup.E
mbedded).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.

Therefore I came to know that I have to make an entry in my
log4j.properties to set appender for logger.
But I do not know what to add in log4j.properties.

My question is how do I set logger as per the above given warning by
tomcat(in red).


Thanks & Regards,
Tejal Khatri
HCL Technologies,Gurgaon
9811687996
